content.text: Match ends, Barcelona 4, Atlético de Madrid 1.

Attempt blocked. David Villa (Barcelona) right footed shot from outside the box is blocked. Assisted by Gerard Piqué.
Goal!  Barcelona 4, Atlético de Madrid 1. Lionel Messi (Barcelona) left footed shot from the centre of the box to the centre of the goal.
